movieTitle: Sunrise: A Song of Two Humans
summary: A sophisticated urban woman seduces a farmer in the hopes that he will murder his neglected wife and join her in the city, but he soon finds himself rekindling his romance with the latter when she discovers their scheme.
synopsis: In this fable-morality subtitled "A Song of Two Humans", the "evil" temptress is a city woman who bewitches farmer Anses and tries to convince him to murder his neglected wife, Indre.
trivia: The scenes in the city were not filmed on location. They were filmed on a vast and expensive set, built especially for the movie.
